snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes 30 of India's technology leaders, a photo-sharing iPhone app jumping to Android and a comic strip look at a...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes 30 of India's technology leaders, a photo-sharing iPhone app jumping to Android and a comic strip look at a possible future technological discovery,

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Data Mining and the Ape App
